help_menu1:
Available commands:
     help - Display this help message
      list - List all available disks
      cfdisk - utility for creating and modifying disk partitions
      format - to run cmd with foramte support
      exit - Back to disk menu
help_menu2:
Available commands:
help - Display this help message
list - List all available disks
command will look like this:
 1. for fat mkfs.fat -F32 /dev/sda1,
 2. mkswap/mkfs.ext4 /dev/sda2
mkfs.fat - Create a fat filesystem for it use -F32 or -F16
mkfs.ext4 - Create an ext4 filesystem
mkfs.btrfs - Create a Btrfs filesystem
mkswap - Create a to make swap filesystem
 exit - Back to disk menu
